mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board(bno, title, content, writer) values (seq_board.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_board order by bno desc

select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from tbl_board
title like concat(concat('%', #{keyword}), '%')
content like concat(concat('%', #{keyword}), '%')
writer like concat(concat('%', #{keyword}), '%')
title like concat(concat('%', #{keyword}), '%') or content like concat(concat('%', #{keyword}), '%')
content like concat(concat('%', #{keyword}), '%') or writer like concat(concat('%', #{keyword}), '%')
title like concat(concat('%', #{keyword}), '%') or content like concat(concat('%', #{keyword}), '%') or writer like concat(concat('%', #{keyword}), '%')
order by bno desc) a ) rnum >= #{startRow} and rnum <= #{endRow}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_attach(fullName, bno) values (#{fullName}, seq_board.currval)
mapper.select: select fullname from tbl_attach where bno = #{bno}
